name: ts-simple-logger
description: Simple console logger for browsers and Node.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:test && npm run clean:pack
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run check:type
scripts.check:type: npm run check:type:src && npm run check:type:test
scripts.check:type:test: npm run build && npm run check:type:test:tsc
scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:types
scripts.pack: npm run clean:pack && npm run pack:dist
scripts.test: npm run clean:test && npm run test:unit:coverage && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:node && npm run test:integration:browser
scripts.test:integration:node: npm run build && npm run pack && vitest run --config vitest.node.config.ts
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run check && npm run build && npm run test
